ie.gmit.sw

Interface DatabaseService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseImpl

    public interface DatabaseService
    The interface DatabaseService is an abstraction that defines what an implementing class must do, but not how it will do it. This interface exposes the database methods a user can invoke. All the methods throw IOException in case we can't find the db4o file.
